mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.NAME AS WRITER_NAME ,N.START_DATE ,N.END_DATE ,N.NAME ,N.LOVE ,N.NO from NOTICE_CALENDAR N JOIN ADMIN A ON (N.WRITER_NO = A.NO) WHERE to_date('${selectedDate}','YYYY-MM-DD') BETWEEN TO_DATE(N.START_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(N.END_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') )R WHERE R.WRITER_NAME = '관리소장' OR R.WRITER_NAME= #{dongNum}
SELECT A.NAME AS WRITER_NAME ,N.START_DATE ,N.END_DATE ,N.NAME FROM NOTICE_CALENDAR N JOIN ADMIN A ON (N.WRITER_NO = A.NO) WHERE A.NAME = '관리소장' OR A.NAME= #{dongName}
SELECT M.NAME AS WRITER_NAME ,N.START_DATE ,N.END_DATE ,N.NAME FROM MEMBER_CALENDAR N JOIN MEMBER M ON(N.WRITER_NO = M.NO) WHERE WRITER_NO =#{memberNo}
